basics.name: Héctor Guerra
basics.label: Frontend Developer & AI Specialist
basics.about: I am a passionate person with overflowing creativity. I love developing my own projects and designing solutions that not only meet clients' needs but exceed them. My focus goes beyond the economic aspect; I am driven by a passion to create unique and meaningful solutions that have a positive impact and leave a lasting impression. I'm here to help you turn your ideas into reality and achieve your business goals effectively.

work.summary: In this business, I worked alongside my father, handling all operations, including administration, customer service, product design, organization, process optimization, and whatever was needed.

projects.name: Playing The Simulation 2.0 MVP
projects.description: I designed an application for the PTS community with the goal of increasing members' execution rate, helping them achieve their professional goals.

projects.name: Mera Parivar NGO MVP
projects.description: I led the Full Stack team, collaborating with UX/UI, Marketing, Data Science, and Cybersecurity. Our goal: to develop a technological solution that would optimize their processes, expand their reach, and increase the NGO's fundraising.
